tool_description: Searches government agency databases to find contact information, submission requirements, and FOIA processing details for specific agencies.

agency_name.description: Name or partial name of the government agency

jurisdiction.description: Federal, state, or local jurisdiction level

state.description: Two-letter state code for state/local agencies

error_messages: Agency not found: The specified agency name does not match any records. Try using partial names or common abbreviations.
Invalid jurisdiction: Use 'federal', 'state', or 'local' for jurisdiction parameter.
State required: For state or local jurisdictions, provide a valid two-letter state code.
Multiple matches found: The agency name is too generic. Be more specific or review suggested matches.
usage: Provide agency_name and optionally specify jurisdiction and state. Returns comprehensive agency contact and submission information for FOIA requests.

agency_full_name.description: Complete official name of the agency

processing_time_days.description: Typical processing time in business days

online_portal_url.description: URL for online FOIA submission portal if available

special_requirements.description: List of special submission requirements or procedures
